sections.text: agency, defined.Displacing agency shall mean (1) any agency carrying out a publicly financed project which causes an individual to become a displaced person and (2) any person lacking the power of eminent domain who carries out a publicly financed project when that project causes an individual to be a displaced person.SourceLaws 1989, LB 254, ยง 9.

76-1222.Displacing agency, defined.

Displacing agency shall mean (1) any agency carrying out a publicly financed project which causes an individual to become a displaced person and (2) any person lacking the power of eminent domain who carries out a publicly financed project when that project causes an individual to be a displaced person.

SourceLaws 1989, LB 254, ยง 9.
